name: Roghayeh Barmaki
content: Roghayeh (Leila) Barmaki | Computer & Information Sciences Roghayeh (Leila) Barmaki Associate Professor Office: 119 S. Main St Ste 105A Phone: 302-831-0071 Email: rlb@udel.edu Personal Website Google Scholar DBLP Profile Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) Lab Roghayeh (Leila) Barmaki Associate Professor EDUCATION Postdoc | 2018 | Johns Hopkins University PhD | 2016 | University of Central Florida MSc | 2012 | Iran University of Science & Technology BSc | Kharazmi University Executive Summary My research interests span Multimodal Machine Learning, Human-Computer Interaction, Virtual and Augmented Reality with applications in Healthcare, and Science and Medical Education. To learn more about my current research projects visit my Google Scholar and my Lab pages (HCI@UD).
